Hongfei Li is a fourth-year Ph.D. student from Department of Operations and Information Management. His current research focuses on three main streams: causal inference in two-sided platforms, artificial intelligence adoption in professional service, and statistical computing in information systems. He has one paper under the second-round review in ACM Transaction in MIS. He also has two papers under first-round review in Information Systems Research and Management Science. During his Ph.D. career, he has taught two courses: operations management ([OPIM 3104](https://hongfeiuconn.github.io/OPIM3104/)) and business information systems ([OPIM 3103](https://hongfeiuconn.github.io/OPIM3103/)).
